name: Blinding Space
description:
- Movement:   WASD   or arrow keys

- Fire weapon: Left mouse (recommended)  or CTRL

-Exit game: ALT+F4

-Duration: approx. 3 mins

Music by Alexander Nakarada: https://alexandernakarada.bandcamp.com/

Description:

Simple 2D space shooter. Mouse + keyboard control. Recommended resolution is 1920x1080.

Hint: Endboss can only be damaged from the front.

Future: The goal is to make a shmup (shoot em up) version with free aiming and challenging endboss fights.

Don´t be afraid to share your thoughts in the comment section below.
